page.title: 11A Day in the Life of Damion.
page.content: A day for me would be to get up at {7.00}and at{7.20}I have{breakfast}of cereal,yoghurt and tea.I get ready for school and at{8.00}my dad takes me to Brenchley & Matfield C.E.P.School in the car.I have an hours play and then School starts at{9.10}and we have {assembly}until 9.45.After{registration we do{maths}for the morning then at 10.40 we have{play}and I play football with my friend Stuart.At 11.00 we do {English}until 11.30 when we have{choir then at 12.00 we have{lunch.}After lunch we have{swimming}until 1.55 then we do some writing and drawing for {project work}and at 2.20 we have play. We tidy up and have a{story,}at{3.30 we go home.When I get home I have chocolate spread sandwiches for my {tea.}After tea I play with my brother and sister.At{7.00}I have a drink and a biscuit then at{7.30}I go to bed.
